bg@list.focusBackground.description: List/Tree background color for the focused item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

c@list.focusForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color for the focused item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bc@list.focusOutline.description: List/Tree outline color for the focused item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bg@list.activeSelectionBackground.description: List/Tree background color for the selected item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

c@list.activeSelectionForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color for the selected item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

c@list.activeSelectionIconForeground.description: List/Tree icon foreground color for the selected item when the list/tree is active. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bg@list.inactiveSelectionBackground.description: List/Tree background color for the selected item when the list/tree is inactive. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

c@list.inactiveSelectionForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color for the selected item when the list/tree is inactive. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

c@list.inactiveSelectionIconForeground.description: List/Tree icon foreground color for the selected item when the list/tree is inactive. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bg@list.inactiveFocusBackground.description: List/Tree background color for the focused item when the list/tree is inactive. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bc@list.inactiveFocusOutline.description: List/Tree outline color for the focused item when the list/tree is inactive. An active list/tree has keyboard focus, an inactive does not.

bg@list.hoverBackground.description: List/Tree background when hovering over items using the mouse.

c@list.hoverForeground.description: List/Tree foreground when hovering over items using the mouse.

bg@list.dropBackground.description: List/Tree drag and drop background when moving items around using the mouse.

c@list.highlightForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color of the match highlights when searching inside the list/tree.

c@list.focusHighlightForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color of the match highlights on actively focused items when searching inside the list/tree.

c@list.invalidItemForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color for invalid items, for example an unresolved root in explorer.

c@list.errorForeground.description: Foreground color of list items containing errors.

c@list.warningForeground.description: Foreground color of list items containing warnings.

bg@listFilterWidget.background.description: Background color of the type filter widget in lists and trees.

bc@listFilterWidget.outline.description: Outline color of the type filter widget in lists and trees.

bc@listFilterWidget.noMatchesOutline.description: Outline color of the type filter widget in lists and trees, when there are no matches.

bg@list.filterMatchBackground.description: Background color of the filtered match.

bc@list.filterMatchBorder.description: Border color of the filtered match.

c@list.deemphasizedForeground.description: List/Tree foreground color for items that are deemphasized.
